content.query:
select taxi_zone.borough,count(1) as total_trips,
sum(case when trip_data.payment_type=1 then 1 else 0 end)as card_trips,
sum(case when trip_data.payment_type=2 then 1 else 0 end)as cash_trips,
cast((sum(case when trip_data.payment_type=1 then 1 else 0 end)/cast(count(1) as decimal)) *100 as decimal(5,2)) as card_trips_percentage,
cast((sum(case when trip_data.payment_type=2 then 1 else 0 end)/cast(count(1) as decimal)) *100 as decimal(5,2)) as cash_trips_percentage
from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        data_source='nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) as trip_data
    join
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        firstrow=2
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint 1,
        Borough varchar(15) 2,
        Zone varchar(50) 3,
        service_zone varchar(15) 4
    )
    AS taxi_zone
    on trip_data.PULocationId=taxi_zone.LocationId
where trip_data.payment_type in ('1','2')
group by taxi_zone.borough
order by total_trips
